forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
